about_the_game:
Adventure as brave actors trapped in the powerful playwright's enchanted dungeon.

Overview

This fast action cooperative roguelike challenges you to act out the playwright's plays and unravel the mysteries of the Quill. Unleash your inner performer, strategize with friends, and conquer the playwright's trials. Engage in frenetic combat against hordes of adversaries, conquer formidable challenges, vanquish imposing bosses, amass potent skills, and rewrite the the script to your advantage!

Key Features

  • Roguelike Gameplay: Filled with fast paced combat and impactful choices that define the course of your performance, where every decision sets the stage for your next heroic encounter.
  • Hero Progression: Develop your character's craft and gear as you progress through the story. Modify the script, take the spotlight, and become the hero you were meant to be.
  • Engrossing Tale: Dive deep into a narrative-driven gameplay experience, filled with async and branching plot lines.
  • Awe-Inspiring Illustrations: Quill's illustrations conjure a fantastical realm and cast of characters that come alive.
  • Submersive Musical Score: Lose yourself in the enchanting music and atmospheric soundscapes.

Community

We're a dedicated team of 3 core developers who've chosen to release an early demo of our game to involve our community in the development process. Gathering player feedback and building a core community at key stages is crucial for refining our online cooperative experience. We've poured our hearts into this project, working tirelessly day and night, and we're eager to keep evolving it together with you!



Add Quill to your Wishlist and you'll be among the first to receive updates on the availability of the Early Access release!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 compatible graphics with at least 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 compatible graphics with at least 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Xbox controller or compatible gamepad
